short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Testmate screen recorder allows testers to record and upload their user testing video to our portal in a fast and easy way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for TestMate testers to be able to record and upload their videos.
